text: What are you doing? Get your hands off me～～

I'm afraid(ノ≧∇≦)ノ

I'm going to be angry
Don't move your hands！
Really...really shameless!
Hentai！
Guess what I'm going to say?

How about it, do you want to play a game with me?

Do you not love me anymore, boo hoo hoo~?

Just keep smiling~

This place documents the history of my moving.

Is it time to say goodbye?
Huh QAQ There will be a period later...

seasons.text: New Year’s Day is here, the new year has begun again, this year is {year}~
It's another Valentine's Day, did you find someone in {year}~
Today is Arbor Day, protect the environment!
Quietly tell you a secret~Today is April Fool's Day, don't be fooled~
Today is May 1 Labor Day, have you planned where to go during the holiday~
It's Children's Day, happy time is always short, it would be nice if I never grow up...
The Victory Day of the Chinese People's War of Resistance Against Japanese Aggression, to remember history, remember the martyrs, cherish peace and create the future.
Teacher's Day, you should say hello to the teacher at school~
National Day is here, celebrate the birthday of the motherland!
Who did you spend Double Eleven with this year~
It's Christmas these days, the owner must be shopping again~

time.text: Good morning! The plan for a day is in the morning, a beautiful day is about to begin~
good morning! Work is going well, don't sit for a long time, get up and move around more!
It's noon, I've worked all morning, now it's lunch time!
It's easy to get sleepy in the afternoon, have you completed your exercise goal today?
It's evening! The sunset scenery outside the window is very beautiful, the most beautiful is the red sunset~
Good evening, how are you doing today?

text: It's already so late, go to bed early, good night~
Take care of your eyes late at night!

time.text: Are you a night owl? Why don't you go to bed so late, wake up tomorrow?

default: Long time no see, time passes so quickly...
Remember to add me to your favorites!
